t24:tooltip.t24:translation: Defines the Minimum duration of the account
Defines the Maximum duration of the account
Indicates the maximum back value date allowed
Minimum credit balance to be held in the account
Input can be either Yes or No
Defines the code for crediting premium amount
Indicates the late payment charge code
It supports both debit and credit interest
The user who last updated the record
Date and time when record was input or authorised
Indicates the User who Authorises the record
Date and time when record was audited
